extraction.title: [CLOSED] Waypoint is published every time entering/leaving a region
extraction.description: Issue by ckrey from Wednesday Jan 15, 2014 at 10:47 GMT Originally opened as binarybucks/mqttitude#268This causes unnecessary network usage.Waypoints will be published when created or updated only.Waypoints will always be published without the retain-flag set so they don't overwrite retained locations
